snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio is reviving a rezoning plan around Grand Central Terminal with a wiser approach.
abstract: Editorial praises New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio for reviving Michael Bloomberg's rezoning plan for East Midtown with a wiser approach; warns trick will be to balance ambitious growth with sensible preservation to make sure transportation grid is strengthened for an influx of workers.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio is reviving a rezoning plan around Grand Central Terminal with a wiser approach.

headline.main: Smart Growth on the East Side
headline.print_headline: Smart Growth on the East Side
